name: Baseball
tagline: An upcoming web-based tool for sabermetrics.
body:
## Baseball
This is a project to develop a new Web-based tool for Sabermetrics research. The tool will have a cooler name, and be hosted on a cooler URL at some point.

### Develop the Code
If you're interested in helping to develop the Web-based tool, check out the code on [Github](https://github.com/bryantrobbins/baseball).

### Join the Group
To get the latest updates about the tool, join the Google Group.

MORE TO COME!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
